articles.title: About this blog
articles.description: Some additional details about the blog

articles.contents:
This blog is constructed using RStudioâ€™s Distill for Rmarkdown framework.
How to create a blog post
In order to contribute a post to this blog, you will need R, RStudio, and an installation of the distill R package:
install.packages("distill")
Then, follow the instructions below:
Fork this repository.
Use the command below to create a new blog post:
distill::create_post("Post Title", author="Author")
Edit and knit the corresponding Rmd file created in the _posts folder.
Commit, push, and make a pull request to integrate the post to this blog.
